participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, she enjoys sharing her love for music and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I love to visit music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store. I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs. I eat my feelings. I want to be a good role model for my daughters.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and witty, he has a knack for networking and enjoys sharing stories about his experiences.
participant_2.background: I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild. I work in finance. I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell. I had one step dad, and fortunately he ignored me.

content.text: Great, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well. What do you do for a living?
I work in finance. What about you?
I own a music store and I love it.
That sounds really cool! I love music. What kind of music do you sell?
All kinds! But I love rock and roll the most.
Me too! I love to go to concerts. I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild. Have you ever been?
I have not! That sounds amazing. I love to hike. I once found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
That sounds awesome! I love hiking too. I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell. Have you ever met anyone famous?
I have not! That sounds amazing. I love watching his movies.
Yeah, he's really funny. I'm glad you're doing well today.
